pages.title: Spell Overview
pages.text: Spells are a core part of this mod. They require a $(l:e_item_spell_scroll)Spell Scroll/el to define what a Spell does and how it works. Defining the effect of a Spell can be done in a $(l:e_block_spell_stone)Spell Stone/el. To create a working spell, you need to decide which components you want to use. The available component types are 'Casts', 'Effects' and 'Modifiers'.

Each spell requires at least one Cast-component, followed by at least one Effect. Modifiers will be applied to the previous Effect or Cast component, but are not required. To add components to the list in the $(l:e_block_spell_stone)Spell Stone/el GUI, you have to put the required items in the top 5 slots of the GUI and then click the 'Add' button. Once all desired components are added to the list, you can click the 'Bind' button to finalize the Spell.
This process can be repeated multiple times for the same spell, in order to add multiple sequences to it.
